payload.name: analogical
payload.core: Transfer relational structure from a known domain/case to a new one, focusing on structural correspondence rather than surface similarity.
proc: identify source domain with known structure
map relational structure to target domain
transfer inferences based on structural alignment
validate that mapping preserves causal relationships
check: causal mechanisms similar, not just surface traits?

diff.vs_case_based: focuses on structural mapping; case-based adds retrieval and adaptation mechanisms
diff.vs_abductive: particular-to-particular transfer; often seeds abductive hypotheses

fail.desc: shared surface traits but different causal structure leads to invalid transfers

rel.name: case-based
rel.link: operational version with retrieval and adaptation

ex.scenario: designing a new distributed system by analogy to biological immune systems
ex.approach: map immune system's decentralized detection and response structure to network security architecture
